column14: Worst product ever. I spent $14.99 and the product didn't even satisfy me. It is not long-lasting not even smudge-proof, leaving the marks of lipstick everywhere. I would prefer to spend $9.99 on Maybelline super last lipstick on which ill save money too. I would even give 1 star to it. I loved the idea of having it 5 in 1 but nowadays it's all about waterproof and smudge proof.

column14: Absolutely LOVE these fun shades! This lipstick is very hydrating, easy to carry around and smells amazing! The color had not faded in the slightest and it sits on the lips without feeling too heavy. It’s long lasting and when I say that...I’m talking from coffee through lunch, dinner, cocktails and beyond. I’m totally satisfied with my purchase and you won’t be disappointed either!
